title: Trellis Apartments
map_address: 1275 Cunningham rd Sw near Powder Springs Rd
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1240 Sq.
We are now accepting in-person tours via scheduled appointments only.
Our virtual tours are also available.
Come home to Trellis and experience a refreshing take on luxury living in Marietta, GA.
This relaxing, pet-friendly community offers comfortable and convenient features designed to help you effortlessly balance your lifestyle.

Experience the perfect blend of premium and executive-level upgrades in an array of two and three bedroom apartments and take advantage of resort-inspired amenities that will reward you day after day.
We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a $150 pet fee required per pet and $20 monthly pet rent required per pet.
There is a non-refundable one time pet fee of $300 for pets 19lbs and under, and pets 20lbs and more have a non-refundable one time fee of $500.
Please call our leasing office for complete pet policy.
